abstract_summ: General practitioners play a significant part in the COVID-19 pandemic by providing whole-person and patient-centred care during this time of crisis . Professor Alan Glasper, from the University of Southampton, discusses how the Care Quality Commission and Nursing and Midwifery Council are working . John Tingle, Lecturer in Law, discusses some recent reports in maternity care, which can be seen to also to have general application across all clinical specialities .
